author: andreas
content:
There is a German three book edition of his diaries that I've read. It contains most of the material from LTI plus lots of autobiographic context. I suspect that your translation is based on an older edition, probably from GDR times. Klemperer stayed in Germany and ended up in GDR. He was some functionary there in the 1950s and I think he later got pretty disillusioned with the party, probably 1956 due to the Hungary crisis, but I can't remember.

As to the comments: I think you should be subscribed and everything should be set up fine. Obviously it ain't. Weird.
